subject: Re: [junit] your opinion needed: package for unit testing codes
msgSnippet: ... Why not? Wouldn t you like to be able to test whether the production install worked? Ron Jeffries www.XProgramming.com The rules are ways of thinking, not
messageBody:
On Friday, January 30, 2004, at 12:43:52 PM, Charles Hayes wrote:

> I would tend to agree with Veny. We wouldn't want the test code to ship
> with the production distribution, right?

Why not? Wouldn't you like to be able to test whether the production
install worked?

Ron Jeffries
www.XProgramming.com
The rules are ways of thinking, not ways to avoid thinking.
